verbs.description: ruben [V: amaro] jr returns as executive with ny mets after coaching for three years former phillies general manager ruben amaro jr will serve as a mets adviser next season he spent last season as the team first base coach mets ruben amaro jr van wagenen philadelphia phillies ruben amaro jr ny mets three years van wagnenen executive brodie van wagenen ny phillies new york mets
